message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair.
I'll take 6000, you get 4000.  It's a little more for me, but you get some too, and we don't have to keep playing this game.
Okay, Bob. Let's be a little more reasonable. I'll take 5500, you get 4500.  This is my final offer.  If you reject, I'll take everything next round.
